objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalSplit' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#8A2BE2'/><stop offset='49%' stop-color='#9932CC'/><stop offset='51%' stop-color='#90EE90'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#7FFF00'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='bubbleGrad' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='rgba(255,255,255,0.8)'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalSplit)'/><g opacity='0.3' fill='url(#bubbleGrad)'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='20'/><circle cx='150' cy='250' r='30'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='25'/><circle cx='200' cy='400' r='40'/><circle cx='100' cy='500' r='35'/><circle cx='400' cy='350' r='28'/><circle cx='450' cy='550' r='45'/><circle cx='550' cy='200' r='22'/><circle cx='650' cy='400' r='38'/><circle cx='750' cy='300' r='26'/><circle cx='850' cy='500' r='32'/><circle cx='700' cy='600' r='42'/><circle cx='900' cy='700' r='36'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='28'/><circle cx='600' cy='900' r='40'/><circle cx='950' cy='150' r='25'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✦ Super solution for biggest bubbles
✦ Eco-friendly & non-toxic
✦ Won't stain clothes or furniture
✦ Hours of fun for kids ages 3+

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This banner presents a playful and vibrant advertisement for a bubble solution product using a diagonal two-tone gradient background. The left half features a vivid purple hue that smoothly transitions into a bright lime green on the right. Overlaid soft, translucent bubble shapes add depth and visual appeal, enhancing the bubbly theme. 
 
The composition is cleanly organized: the top-left corner includes a bold heading (`heading`), followed by a smaller but equally vibrant subheading (`subheading`). Below that, a tagline (`tagline`) introduces the product category. A feature list (`description`) highlights the product's benefits with bullet points. Midway down, pricing emphasis is portrayed using a yellow label (`price_label`) followed by a large price text (`price`). At the bottom left, a rounded pink call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with enticing text (`cta`) invites user interaction. On the right side, a high-resolution image of the bubble product (`product_image`) dominates the space, adding real-world context.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple (#8A2BE2 / #9932CC)
- Lime Green (#90EE90 / #7FFF00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Yellow (#FFFF00)
- Hot Pink (#FF1493)

This banner uses fun, rounded fonts and vibrant, playful tones to appeal especially to children or parents shopping for outdoor playtime products.
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and playful color palette designed to appeal to children. The dominant color is a translucent neon green (#A3F25D) from the liquid, which evokes freshness and fun. The label uses bold purples (#813AAC), eye-catching yellows (#FFD900), and a mix of blues (#65C3FA) and pink bubble accents (#E3B5F3). The text "Gazillion" is blended with gradients of yellow and green with a blue drop shadow for contrast and readability. The vivid colors are harmonized through complementary blending and outlined text, while the plastic texture and bubble reflections add dynamic highlights. This palette is ideal for cheerful, energetic advertising designs.
